snippet: Bill Belichick, who is now 1-5 against Tom Coughlin, was understandably not in a mood to chat after the Giants beat the Patriots.
abstract: Bill Belichick, who is now 1-5 against Tom Coughlin, was understandably not in a mood to chat after the Giants beat the Patriots.
lead_paragraph: Bill Belichick, who is now 1-5 against Tom Coughlin, was understandably not in a mood to chat after the Super Bowl.

headline.main: Belichick's Answers Are Clipped After Super Bowl Loss
